channel.title: -nvm-fixed-

item.title: -nvm-fixed-
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

I’m not sure what the frames for the emotes are, nor do I know how they can be found.
Sorry.

But each emote can be found in client.java.
Just search the name of the emote you wish to find, and it should show up.
Then you can edit the animation it does, or even make it do something completely different.

As for npc drops, they can be found in npchandler.java.
I’m not sure off the top of my head what you should search for, but you should be able to find it.

The ids of the items that are dropped, however, can be found in item.java, item2.java, and item3.java.

Read full topic

item.title: -nvm-fixed-
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

[quote=“xx qwertyuiop xx, post:2, topic:162678”]Here.

[code]
//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

//created by Owner Ethan
//60% creds to Sharnet/My Brother

//start of parakeetserver general npc list
spawn = 912 2606 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 zammy battle mage
spawn = 1264 2604 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 saradomin battle mage
spawn = 351 2608 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 man (replaces guthix battle mage)
spawn = 359 2605 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 anti-masser man
spawn = 359 2607 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 anti-masser man2
//end of parakeetserver general npc list

//start of shops
spawn = 261 2609 3095 0 0 0 0 0 1 Weapons shop
//end of shops

//start of lowleveltrain
spawn = 117 3223 3225 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 117 3224 3227 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 117 3225 3225 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 117 3221 3225 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 123 3220 3230 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hobgoblin
spawn = 123 3220 3233 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hobgoblin
spawn = 123 3222 3232 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hobgoblin
spawn = 283 3223 3213 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief
spawn = 283 3221 3214 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief
spawn = 283 3224 3212 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief
spawn = 283 3224 3210 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief

//end of lowleveltrain

//start of highlevel train
//end of highlevel train
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST][/code][/quote]
THANKS SO MUCH XX qertyuip!!!

whatd you do to fix it?

item.title: -nvm-fixed-
item.dc:creator: @snowycards snowycards
item.description:
@snowycards wrote:

FIXED SORRY GUYShey everyone! so recently i was adding npcs to my autospawn.cfg when suddenly i tried to save and it became a read-only file… and i saved it and it compiled fine, but when i launed runserver.bat, this is what it said… and now when i log on, it just shows a black screen and connection lost, and on my run server it says im already online and trying to relog

[code]WorldObjects.cfg: file not found.
Rickscape V5 is on the run On 43594 !
Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "123 "

      at java.lang.Integer.parseInt<Integer.java:456>
      at java.lang.Integer.parseInt<Integer.java:497>
      at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn<NPCHandler.java:2397>
      at NPCHandler.<init><NPCHandler.java:29>
      at server.main<server.java:30>

[/code]

and here is what my autospawn.cfg looks like…

[code]//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

//created by Owner Ethan
//60% creds to Sharnet/My Brother

//start of parakeetserver general npc list
spawn = 912 2606 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 zammy battle mage
spawn = 1264 2604 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 saradomin battle mage
spawn = 351 2608 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 man (replaces guthix battle mage)
spawn = 359 2605 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 anti-masser man
spawn = 359 2607 3105 0 0 0 0 0 1 anti-masser man2
//end of parakeetserver general npc list

//start of shops
spawn = 261 2609 3095 0 0 0 0 0 1 Weapons shop
//end of shops

//start of lowleveltrain
spawn = 117 3223 3225 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 117 3224 3227 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 117 3225 3225 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 117 3221 3225 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hill Giant
spawn = 123 3220 3230 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hobgoblin
spawn = 123 3220 3233 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hobgoblin
spawn = 123 3222 3232 0 0 0 0 0 1 Hobgoblin
spawn = 283 3223 3213 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief
spawn = 283 3221 3214 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief
spawn = 283 3224 3212 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief
spawn = 283 3224 3210 0 0 0 0 0 1 Thief

//end of lowleveltrain

//start of highlevel train
//end of highlevel train
[ENDOFSPAWNLIST]
[/code]
of course, the NPCHandler has indents between the numbers…
please help!!!

thanks!

Read full topic
